amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to replace the text of the bill with the language of S. 1447, the "Aviation Security Act", which passed the Senate on Oct. 11, 2001.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in House Report 107-264 to insert a complete new text.

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Oberstar.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oberstar amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 214 - 218 (Roll no. 423).
